title: Organist Celebrates 25 Years Playing Wanamaker Organ
teaser: Peter Conte has serenaded shoppers in Philadelphia for 2 shows a day, 6 days a week for more than 2 decades. On Saturday, those attending Wanamaker Organ Day will hear him and the refurbished organ.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
